    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long COUNT

      • flip

        public boolean flip(double prob)
        Flip a coin, with the specified probability.
        Parameters:
        prob - The probability that this method returns true.
        Returns:
        True or false.

      • simpleFlip

        public void simpleFlip()
        This is just a simple coin flip. Random number generator should make this about 0.5. P(H) = 0.5 P(~H) = 0.5

      • probHeadsTotal

        public void probHeadsTotal()
        What is the total probability of flipping heads.

      • fairWithHeads

        public void fairWithHeads()
        What is the probability of using a fair coin when you got heads. This would normally use Bayes rule, however, we are sampling.
